Class WitchHelper

    Class that creates the recipes from potions with random ingredients

    marcu

    • Method Detail

      • generateRandomIngredients

        public void generateRandomIngredients()
        Method that generates a random number of ingredients from 4 to 8 for each potion. We pick random ingredients from the ingredients array present in CovenHelper We iterate through the ingredients and give each ingredient a 50% chance to be picked We save the recipes in a Map where the key is the potion name and the value is the ingredients recipe

      • createPotionNames

        public void createPotionNames()
        Method that creates the potion names Those are predefined by the user
